rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry space that adheres to Vastu by ensuring a clear view of the entrance from within the house. Scandinavian design elements include minimalistic decor and natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area with large windows to maximize natural daylight. Vastu principles suggest the seating is oriented towards the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A functional dining space with a Scandinavian aesthetic; minimalistic furniture and earthy tones. Placed adjacent to the kitchen for practicality.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet efficient cooking area with modern appliances. The layout follows Vastu by keeping the kitchen in a north-east corner for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A quiet study and library space designed with ample shelving and natural light. Scandinavian style with clean lines and a neutral color palette.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area integrated within the ground floor. It features space-efficient equipment and storage for budget-friendly exercise solutions.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool area located near the garden. The design considers local norms by having a safety zone and adheres to Vastu by aligning with natural elements.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with Scandinavian minimalistic style and robust local materials, ensuring Vastu alignment.
Large, energy-efficient windows in the living room and study/library to allow maximum natural light while maintaining thermal insulation.
Balcony attached to the living room for additional outdoor space, designed with minimalist railings and privacy screens according to local aesthetics.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with Vastu-aligned headboard placement and Scandinavian simplicity. Includes built-in closets to optimize space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom ensuring privacy and quietude. Features a small ensuite bathroom adjoining the room.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with Scandinavian design elements and Vastu principles for a peaceful environment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A further guest bedroom or study area with convertible furniture to maximize utility on a tight budget.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: The fifth bedroom designed to be versatile for family use or home office, keeping in mind both Vastu and Scandinavian minimalism.

openings.location: central corridor connecting ground and first floor
openings.description: A safe and compact staircase design following local building norms with a Scandinavian aesthetic.
Floor-to-ceiling windows designed for light, privacy and scenic views, ensuring Vastu principles of energy flow.
